title: President praises security forces for successful operation in Sherani, Balochistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 3 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Friday commended the security forces for successful operation against the terrorists in district Sherani of Balochistan.
In a statement, he acknowledged the professionalism and bravery of security forces in eliminating the Indian-backed Fitna-al-Khawarij terrorists. He described the soldiers as national heroes who thwarted the nefarious designs of anti-state elements.
“Pakistan’s people and the armed forces stood shoulder-to-shoulder for completely eliminating terrorism from the country,” the president said reaffirming the state’s resolve to continue all possible measures for the safety of the people and establish peace across the country.
“The nation pay tribute to its martyrs,” the president added.
